description:
At Thomas & Wickenheiser, LLC, we have secured millions of dollars on behalf of people who suffer the unexpected. In medical malpractice and other personal injury cases, our Peabody, Massachusetts, law firm excels at returning every possible dollar to our clients. We know how to hold insurance companies, physicians, medical facilities and others responsible for the harm they caused. Along the way, we offer the people we represent compassion and guidance.A few notable settlements our law firm has obtained include the following:

  • A $4.5 million award in a birth injury case that resulted in cerebral palsy
  • A $1 million settlement in a delayed cancer diagnosis
  • A $1.15 million award following an error during anesthesia administration

Together, the team at our law firm combines decades of experience in the courtroom. Partner Amy Thomas formerly worked in insurance defense and has a keen understanding of how these companies work. Partner Kathryn Wickenheiser has devoted her career to working with injured parties. Our attorneys at Thomas & Wickenheiser, LLC, have earned honors that include being named by the American Institute of Trial Lawyers as Litigator of the Year; being named in the American Institute of Personal Injury Attorneys' Top Ten Female Personal Injury Attorneys in Massachusetts; and being named a Super Lawyers Rising Star.
